description.value:
You are a worker of wonders and performer of minor miracles. The source of your abilities can be heritage, from intensive training, exposure to another plane of existence, or something entirely different that has granted you a broad array of potential benefits.

Options:

@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.TJXzeGtg0Egx2Qax]{Thaumaturge*} (required for other bullets, provides free extra bullet)
